title: Colorado Military Medical Heritage Fund
description: To build an endowment to provide an award to an outstanding junior medical student who is a recipient of a Military Medical Scholarship.  If the fund does not reach the endowment minimum in 5 years, it will remain a current fund.
marketingContent: To build an endowment to provide an award to an outstanding junior medical student who is a recipient of a Military Medical Scholarship. If the fund does not reach the endowment minimum in 5 years, it will remain a current fund.
